content: kitten nuggets this project is small and fairly quick it can be done with small bits of left over yarn you can also customize your kittens by alternating light and dark yarns to create a tabby pattern or use a light colored yarn for the base and the bobble stitches to create the look of a colored kitty with a white belly and feet these kitties make excellent party favors and class gifts but i ve also found that they make great cat toys and excellent gifts for any cat lover if you mimic the colors of their pets materials and notions - worsted weight yarn red heart caron simply soft i love this cotton are just a few of the yarns i ve used -12 mm safety eyes you could possibly use buttons but it wouldn t have the same effect and i wouldn t recommend them for very small children or cats -fiber fill for stuffing i added stiff mint wrappers to the stuffing when making cat toys to create a crinkle noise when bitten -tapestry needle -f/5-3 75mm crochet hook or hook to make guage small enough that stuffing doesn t poke out -stitch markers can be helpful but are not necessary if you cant keep track of your stitches techniques to know -magic loop -single_crochet single_crochet -chain chain -slip sl -single_crochet 2 together decrease decrease -bobble stitch crochet 5 double_crochet stitches together in one base stitch youtube can be helpful if you need further instructions set up single_crochet 8 into magic loop do not join work row 1 and 2 in the round place marker at beginning of rounds if necessary row 1 2 single_crochet into each stitch 16 row 2 * single_crochet 2sc* repeat 8 times 24 row 3 single_crochet 9 bobble st single_crochet 4 bobble st sc9 row 4 tail shaping single_crochet chain 4 sl in second chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chain sl to same hole as single_crochet before chain chain 1 single_crochet to end of row join to ch1 skipping over tail and pull tight 24 row 5-8 chain 1 single_crochet 24 join 24 row 9 ch1 decrease sc8 decrease decrease sc8 decrease join 20 row 10 ch1 single_crochet 20 join 20 row 11 ch1 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease decrease single_crochet 6 decrease join fasten_off leaving roughly 8inch tail 16 place safety eyes in row 7 using feet for reference to get them even i like to leave 2 stitches between eyes stuff the cat then pinch the opening flat and sew closed across top by weaving long tail over 4 stitches picture a and stitching from one corner to the other using outside stitches only yellow in picture b fasten_off and weave in end finally use about 6 inches of nose color pink is fairly universal and grey works well for black cats and siamese to make a nose roughly one stitch wide just below the eyes picture a picture b # for siamese cats use white or cream
